Container.Name: jellylooter
Container.Overview: JellyLooter is a web-based tool for downloading media from remote Jellyfin and Emby servers. Features include: browsing remote libraries with poster artwork, multi-select downloads, automatic sync scheduling, duplicate detection via local server integration, speed limiting, and a modern dark/light theme UI. Perfect for syncing media between servers or downloading content from friends' libraries (with permission).

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: Directory for storing configuration files and authentication data

Config.Name: Storage Directory
Config.Description: Root directory for downloading media. You can browse subdirectories within the app.

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Timezone for scheduled tasks (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London, Asia/Tokyo)

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (use 'id -u' to find yours)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (use 'id -g' to find yours)

Config.Name: Secret Key
Config.Description: Optional: Custom secret key for session encryption. Leave blank to auto-generate.
